query:
UPDATE activity SET
                  location_id = $2,
                  name_nl = $3,
                  name_en = $4,
                  image = $5,
                  description_nl = $6,
                  description_en = $7,
                  registration_start = $8,
                  registration_end = $9,
                  registration_max = $10,
                  waiting_list_max = $11,
                  is_hidden = $12,
                  required_membership_status = $13::membership_status[],
                  activity_type = $14,
                  questions = $15,
                  metadata = $16,
                  updated = now()
            WHERE id = $1
